availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Zachariah Lee (Franklin County, Kentucky, farm laborer. )

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farm laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Zachariah Lee and Levina Lee. Married to Irene Allison Lee. Father of Harry Clinton Lee. Student in Franklin County, Kentucky in 1850. Farm laborer in Franklin County in 1860. Farmer in Franklin County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 90a.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 367.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Franklin County, KY, July1863, p. 13.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #6720.
"Zachariah Lee (1833-1865)," Find A Grave, Memorial #43196154, accessed March 28, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/43196154.
